To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private PercentagePriceOscillator _ppo;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_ppo = PPO(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod, movingAverageType);

// In OnData()
if (_ppo.IsReady)
{
    var fast = _ppo.Fast.Value;
    var slow = _ppo.Slow.Value;
    var signal = _ppo.Signal.Value;
    var histogram = _ppo.Histogram.Value;
    var current = _ppo.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.ppo = self.PPO(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod, movingAverageType)

# In OnData()
if self.ppo.IsReady:
    fast = self.ppo.Fast.Value
    slow = self.ppo.Slow.Value
    signal = self.ppo.Signal.Value
    histogram = self.ppo.Histogram.Value
    current = self.ppo.Current.Value
